text: Maaŋ muuŋgip, guma the khaŋ suanga, “Gu guigira Fhe Bakɨme kaŋgi,” ana maaŋ suaŋv, ana Fhe Bakɨme suaŋgi tɨvi zɨn vui fhu, mba guma, ana bigi shɨkshɨgi guma ma. Ana maaŋ suaŋv, ana Fhe Bakɨme suaŋgi tɨvi zɨn vui fhu, mba guma, ana bigi shɨkshɨgi guma ma. Fhe Bakɨme buni guari ana ndava vhen ki fhuvara.
